Platform.Title: Affymetrix Mycobacterium bovis BCG GeneChip Array

Column.Name: ID
Column.Description: Affyemtrix Probe Set Name

Column.Name: ORF
Column.Description: locus tag

Column.Name: GB_ACC
Column.Description: GenBank or RefSeq accession number

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: probes for which ORF or GB_ACC identifier is unavailable

Column.Name: SEQUENCE
Column.Description: probe sequence

Sample.Title: Mycobacterium bovis BCG_no treatment_0min_replicate1

Channel.Biomaterial-Provider: Network on Antimicrobial Resistance in Mycobacterium bovis BCG
Channel.Growth-Protocol: (i) we initiated M. bovis cultures at 37°C with shaking at 250 rpm using sterilized Middlebrook 7H9 broth for 5days, (ii) Mycobacteria were harvested, washed and resuspended in sterilized Lurria-Bertani (LB) broth with 0.1% (v/v) Tween 80. The cultures were incubated for a further 24 hours with shaking at 37°C. To test the efficacy of an antimicrobial against mycobacteria, several concentrations of peracetic acid were added to the cells.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was isolated after 10 and 20 min incubation with and without (control) peracetic acid using the RiboPure – Bacteria kit (Ambion, Inc., Austin, TX)[16]. The mycobacterial cells treated with peracetic acid and untreated cells as controls were harvested and resuspended in PBS buffer. The mini-bead beater-16 (Bio spec products Inc, Bartlesville, OK) was used to break down the cells for 1 minute (5 times) with intermittent holding on ice for 2 minutes after each beating period.
Channel.Label: Biotin
Channel.Label-Protocol: Standard Affymetrix procedures. Approximately 10 µg of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cDNA targets.

Sample.Scan-Protocol: Standard Affymetrix procedures (target signal value was 500)

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: GCOS-calculated signal intensity

Column.Name: ABS_CALL
Column.Description: the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M)

Column.Name: DETECTION P-VALUE
Column.Description: 'detection p-value', p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

Series.Title: Microarray Analysis of Toxicogenomic Effects of peracetic acid on Mycobacterium bovis BCG
Series.Summary:
In the present study, we employed Affymetrix Mycobacterium bovis BCG GeneChip arrays to investigate the dynamics of global gene expression profiles during the cellular response of Mycobacterium bovis BCG to Peracetic acid, which involved initial growth inhibition and metabolism.
Keywords: Transcriptome study
Series.Overall-Design: We conducted three independent microarray experiments (biological replicates) in the absence (control) and the presence (experimental) of Peracetic acid. We calculated fold change as the ratio between the signal averages of three untreated (control) and three Peracetic acid-treated (experimental) cultures for 0, 10 and 20 min exposures.
